mapper.select: SELECT s.sch_no schNo ,c.descript ,s.kind ,s.title title ,s.content content ,s.start_time startTime ,s.end_time endTime FROM schedules s inner join common_code c on s.kind = c.common_code inner join schedule_attendance sa ON sa.sch_no = s.sch_no where sa.emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT s.sch_no schNo, c.descript, s.kind, s.title title, s.content content, s.start_time startTime, s.end_time endTime, e.ename FROM schedules s INNER JOIN common_code c ON s.kind = c.common_code left JOIN schedule_attendance sa ON s.sch_no = sa.sch_no left JOIN emp e ON sa.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE s.sch_no = #{schNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules SET title = #{title}, kind = #{kind}, content = #{content}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} WHERE sch_no = #{schNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules( kind, title, content, start_time, end_time ) VALUES ( #{kind}, #{title}, #{content}, STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(#{revDate}, ' ', CASE WHEN #{revTimeDescript} LIKE '%오후%' THEN CAST(SUBSTR(#{revTimeDescript}, -2) AS UNSIGNED) + 12 ELSE CAST(SUBSTR(#{revTimeDescript}, -2) AS UNSIGNED) END ), '%Y-%m-%d %H' ), STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(#{revDate}, ' ', CASE WHEN #{revTimeDescript} LIKE '%오후%' THEN CAST(SUBSTR(#{revTimeDescript}, -2) AS UNSIGNED) + 12 ELSE CAST(SUBSTR(#{revTimeDescript}, -2) AS UNSIGNED) END ), '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) + INTERVAL 1 HOUR )
